headline: [VIDEO] Jim Jordan Makes a Promise to Voters… Vows to Expose Joe’s Role in “Biden Crime Family Enterprise”
author: Sophie O’Hara
sentences: Jim Jordan appeared on “Fox and Friends” Tuesday and said out loud what we all know to be true: Joe Biden was involved in his son Hunter’s business dealings with foreign entities even though he and his admin are trying to deny it.

If we get the majority—if the American people put us there—we’re going to look at this; we’re going to look at the lab leak with the [Dr.] Fauci situation; we’re going to look at the school boards issue with the Dept.

We’re going to look at all those issues because the American people deserve the truth.”

We need someone like Jim Jordan in the Speaker role.
“Well, it sure looks like now it is a family enterprise based on the recent text messages we have seen,” Jordan said of the emerging evidence related to the laptop.
Jim is speaking out just as the House Oversight Committee calls for further investigation into the text messages allegedly stored on Hunter’s laptop from hell.

In addition, there are emails where Hunter lamented over having to spend half of his salary to pay Joe’s bills and other expenses.
